title: False game abandonment.
body:
Hi Riot,

So I left my client open overnight so an update was released while I already had the client open (which I didn't know about). Then, when I tried to join an ARAM the whole client just froze and crashed so I had to re-open it. Afterwards, when I tried starting a game I was given a fifteen minute abandonment ban. Please work on a better system and remove my ban as I only just had time for one game tonight due to work and I'm highly disappointed that I was unable to play due to faults on your end.

Thanks,
Sparmerlin.
